column2: Steel Connect, Inc. is a holding company, which engages in the provision of supply chain management and direct marketing services. The company is headquartered in Waltham, Massachusetts and currently employs 3,760 full-time employees. The firm provides physical supply chain and marketing solutions through its subsidiaries, ModusLink Corporation and IWCO Direct Holdings, Inc (IWCO Direct). The firm operates through four segments: Americas, Asia, Europe and e-business. Its solutions include warehousing and distribution, repair and recovery, aftersales, returns management, e-commerce, contact center, financial management, Poetic entitlement management, subscription services, material planning and factory supply and Internet of Things. ModusLink Corporation provides digital and physical supply chain solutions to a range of industries, including consumer electronics, communications, computing, software, storage, consumer packaged goods, medical devices, software and content, and retail industries. IWCO Direct provides data-driven marketing solutions that help clients drive response across all marketing channels.
